abstract: Sony shares rose nearly 3 percent at one stage on Tuesday as traders cited media reports speculating that the Japanese electronics maker could be a potential acquisition target of Apple.
snippet: Sony shares rose nearly 3 percent at one stage on Tuesday as traders cited media reports speculating that the Japanese electronics maker could be a potential acquisition target of Apple.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Sony rose nearly 3 percent at one point on Tuesday as traders cited media reports speculating that the Japanese electronics maker could be a potential acquisition target of Apple, Reuters reports.

headline.main: Sony Shares Rise on Talk of Interest From Apple
